attributes.action: ask the Queen to consider granting Princess Diana the posthumous title of "HRH Princess Mother"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The mawkish obsession with the late princess threatens to drag an unhappy episode ever onward, and this needs now to be brought to a head. Diana’s title on her death was ridiculous. Since her divorce, she has no direct connection with the House of Wales; and as the mother of a future king, she merits the HRH label regardless of her marital position. “HRH Diana, The Princess Mother” recognises her correct status in history, allowing the princes’ stepmother to become Queen upon the accession of Prince Charles, but giving Diana the ultimate recognition a generation later.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
